articles.author: Brad Plumer, Coral Davenport
articles.title: Science Under Attack: How Trump Is Sidelining Researchers and Their Work - The New York Times
articles.description: In three years, the administration has diminished the role of science in policymaking while disrupting research projects nationwide. Experts say the effects could be felt for years.
articles.content:
This year, for instance, the National Park Services principle climate change scientist, Patrick Gonzalez, received a cease and desist letter from supervisors after testifying to Congress about the risks that global warming posed to national parks.
I saw it a… [+1981 chars]

articles.author: Clyde Haberman and Zach Gross
articles.title: Look Up
articles.description: Put down your phone and take in the wonders around you.

articles.title: The Decade of Disillusionment

articles.author: Nicholas Kristof
articles.title: This Has Been the Best Year Ever
articles.description: For humanity over all, life just keeps getting better.
articles.content: Yes, its still appalling that a child dies somewhere in the world every six seconds but consider that just a couple of decades ago, a child died every three seconds. Recognizing that progress is possible can be a spur to do more, and thats why I write this an… [+1899 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Thai Navy SEAL Dies of Blood Infection a Year After Cave Rescue
articles.description: A SEAL who helped rescue of 12 boys and their soccer coach from a flooded cave has died of an infection contracted during the risky operation.
articles.content:
BANGKOK A Thai Navy SEAL who was part of the dramatic rescue of 12 boys and their soccer coach from a flooded cave has died of a blood infection contracted during the risky operation, the Royal Thai Navy said.
Petty Officer 1st Class Bayroot Pakbara was rece… [+704 chars]

articles.description: The actress was joined by her “Grace and Frankie” co-star Lily Tomlin to headline a climate rally that offered plenty of chances to get arrested, but few takers.
articles.content:
